page.title: 03Family life in New Mills.
page.content: My dad works at R.E.Knowles. He goes to work at 8:00 am and he comes back at 5:00 pm.He works very hard, he does 9 hours a day. My mum is a housewife. Sometimes she goes out on Friday.She goes to Buxton shopping. My sister is 14 years old. She goes to a Comprehensive School in New Mills. She has a paper round. l go to Newtown Primary School. I travel to school by bus and travel back by bus. My dad works at a Hotpoint shop on Albion Road. Every week day he goes out doing deliveries or even mending cookers, washing machines and fridges. He works 9 hours a day. On Saturdays we open at 10am and close at 5pm. My mum works in the same shop and she sometimes works at our shop in Buxton. My sister also goes to New Mills Comprehensive School. We live just across from the Comprehensive School.
